 Project Name And Goal
 
AdvaS is the abbreviation for Advanced Search. It is designed to be used as an additional python module. This module provides various algorithms for retrieving information from text documents. The algorithms are available as Python classes, and according methods. AdvaS can be used in Information Retrieval (IR), Data Mining (DM) and Applied Linguistics (AL). AdvaS may be used as
  • as a back-end of a search engine or a Content Management System (CMS),
  • for database lookup and optimization,
  • as a part of a spell-checker, and
  • to determine the similarity of text sets
